game.name: School Day Preps
game.description:
One of your favorite and most gorgeous princesses is ready to go for her school. But, she does not know what to do to make her look like a school girl. Now she has appointed you as her designer. Would you like to accept this challenge and help her to attain a perfect school look? Join School Day Preps game and be prepared to apply all your make-up and fashion abilities to guide her choose a wonderful fashion outfit for school!

When you click the play button, you would meet a beautiful girl who wants your fashion advice on the preparation for school. Start with the make-up job and then guide her to pick up a suitable school outfit in this one of the best dressing games for girls! Give her nice lenses, mascara, eyelashes and eyeliner! Do not forget to give her a matching lipstick to provide her a complete makeover. Once it is done, go through all the outfit options you see on the right side of the screen.

Dress her up with a cool frock and a pair of leggings or find an awesome t-shirt and combine it with a matching short in this fun girls game! You can also make her look fabulous with a pair of goggles, a cap and hairband. Give her a fine mobile and a pair of fancy shoes! She will not forget to appreciate your efforts so try to give your best. Hurry up girls! Her friends are waiting for her in school. Hope your matchless make-up and fashion abilities will help her to look fabulous in school! Have fun alone or with your friends no download required!
